pages.text: With the power of past generations, you're able to replicate a machine that will churn out Watchers under your command!

The cage requires a Mechanized Iron Block to be added, in order to call forth a Watcher. Much like the Spider Nest, right-clicking the nest with a Wand or Staff will make it so that it will only spawn a servant if a valid target is near it. While crouching, however, it will change whether the servant will spawn patrolling the block or following the owner.
